title: Curation Protocol: Washington Compost Data
description: This dataset was curated for the LIS 545 Data Curation course at the University of Washington, Information School. It consolidates compost data from the Washington State Department of Ecology and covers the annual tonnage of materials composted by type and year.

distribution.description: A .XLSX file containing the consolidated dataset created from the Department of Ecology's compost data.

dataset.rights: This data is freely available to the public.
